name: Forest Birds Hunter 3D
description:
Forest Birds Hunter 3D is for those passionate gamers who are getting tired of typical sniper shooting games and want some new fun and adventure.
Features:
• Top free offline jungle shooting game and hunting game.
• Excellent sniper physics and controls implemented.
• Supports all devices.
• Realistic 3D graphics with dynamic lighting and amazing killing effects.
• User friendly GUI and controls.
• Real adventuring forest Environment looks like adventure movies.
